showEstimation.message: Display estimated arrival at live head

smooth_desc.message:
CAUTION
Aggressive mode consumes the buffer as much as possible, so live streams may frequently pause.

slowdownAtLiveHead.message: Set the playback rate to 1.05x near the live stream head.

keepBufferHealth.message: Set the playback rate to 1.0x when the buffer health is low.

appDesc.message: This extension syncs YouTube live streams in real-time by accelerating viewer-delayed streams caused by data reception delays.
